stories.text:
Hi HN community ! This is a question remote companies and remote teams.
Do you have issues organizing team meetings when participants are spread across different timezones ? Do you have any kind of tools to remedy that ?
stories.title: Ask HN: Organize meetings across different timezones
An Interview with a Professional Jump Roper
Google X spins out in-ear EEG startup, NextSense

stories.text:
Hi all

I've been a great supporter and a fan of the Elixir language and having built huge codebases of my side projects in it, I could feel the robustness and also enjoy the general nature of FP. There were, times when things felt more difficult and challenging compared to Ruby, which was something I was very proficient at before then. Looks like the trend for Elixir Posts and activity on this forum is in the decline now, was wondering what happened to it?! Are people moving away from it already?
stories.title: Ask HN: Whatever Happened to Elixir?
What will Twitter's board say? Tech analysts are divided over Musk takeover bid
